title: Use pill_hole_with_rect_pad with rectPad and pcbRotation props for rectangular plated holes
description: Introduces a new method for handling rectangular plated holes by using pill_hole_with_rect_pad with rectPad and pcbRotation properties, enhancing the footprint generation for rectangular pads.

title: fix: Support externally connected pins with hidden schematic ports
description: Fixes crash when externallyConnectedPins references pins not visible in schPinArrangement
body:
closes https://github.com/tscircuit/core/issues/1080

Fixes crash when `externallyConnectedPins` references pins not visible in `schPinArrangement`. 

**Problem:** 
- Chip components with `externallyConnectedPins={[["pin12", "pin13"]]}` would crash if pin13 wasn't included in `schPinArrangement` 
- Error: `Can't get schematic port position after layout for "pin13", no schematic_port_id` 

**Root Cause:** 
1. Ports were only created for pins explicitly listed in `schPinArrangement` 
2. Schematic trace rendering assumed all connected ports had schematic representations 

**Solution:** 
1. **Chip.initPorts()**: Ensure all pins referenced in `externallyConnectedPins` have port objects created, even if not visible in schematic 
2. **Trace rendering**: Filter out ports without `schematic_port_id` before attempting to get their positions

title: Support Inline Flex
description: Adds support for inline flex layout in PCB groups, allowing for more flexible component arrangement.

title: Support `pcbFlexGap` + Size Components prior to Layout
description: Adds support for pcbFlexGap and moves PcbComponentSizeCalculation prior to layout, along with flex snapshot updates.
body:
- **add support for pcbFlexGap and move PcbComponentSizeCalculation prior to layout**
- **more flex snapshot updates**

title: Add support for new group layout props
description: Adds support for new layout properties including pcbPack, pcbGridRowGap, and pcbGridColumnGap in the Group component, while updating dependencies and removing obsolete tests.
body:
## Summary

- expose pcbPack in PCB layout mode selection
- support pcbGridRowGap/gridRowGap and pcbGridColumnGap/gridColumnGap

- remove group-props.test which belonged to another repo

## Testing

- `bun test tests/features/pcb-pack-layout`
